Fly With United Air Lines
Based on the firm foundation of six years' experience and 50,000,000
miles of air transport operations, United Air Lines invites you to
travel on its nation-wide air passenger, mail and express service.

properties.sfomuseum:description: Timetable issued by United Air Lines, effective January 15, 1933; 14-page fold-out; yellow and blue cover with route map, illustration of Boeing 80A, and text promoting winter travel.
